known_issues: Back button is currently placed on the profile page instead of on the Lily page to the left of the pond avatar.

existing_features.title: Update the Lily detail page (`frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx`) so the existing Reddit-style Back button is positioned immediately to the left of the pond avatar within the lily header row (same row that currently starts with the pond avatar and metadata), instead of being rendered as a separate block above the content.

Ensure the Back button change is scoped to the Lily detail page only, and that no Back button UI is added to or rendered on the frog profile page (`frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx`) as part of this fix.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix back button placement: should be on Lily page to the left of the pond avatar (not on the profile page)

projectName: Fix back button placement on Lily page header
